Text:
It's all about ME, ME & ME. Over the last 3 weeks, it's become completely obvious, that, Alex Jones is a Pentagon/DARPA Mind Control Puppet.
His psychological profile is perfect to distract people with his personal bias, judgements & doubts.
He does not consider indigenious peoples stories or work as significant. If it ain't from Rothchild's or Rockerfella documented admissions, well it just never happened or is not the truth, PERIOD!!.

Becareful folks, Alex has some good qualities, but, his energy & state of mind is quite removed from Cosmic Christ Consciousness. That's why his so angry most the time & projects it onto innocent people around him. Have you noticed how he is constantly attacking & critizing people. He can't stop and thats why they picked him.
They will never kill Alex, because, he's doing exactly what they want. And what is that. To make you into a homogized, desensitized and mindless robot, that's what!!

Alex Jones, ain't the tip of the spear, he is a deluded ego manic, who clearly has the demonic Nephilim blood in him, that's why he is so aggressive and love's to hate.

In the Spirit of Truth.
